document_data.name: Purple Wyrm Inn and Tavern
document_data.mainbody: The '''Purple Wyrm Inn and Tavern''' was a very famous inn and tavern in [[Baldur's Gate]], located next door to the north from the [[Watchful Shield (shrine)|Watchful Shield]] shrine.
document_data.Inhabitants: Compared to the [[Elfsong Tavern]], the tavern was frequented more by merchants, employers and adventurers. The inn was used by the [[Harper]] [[Randalla Brasshorn]] as her base of operations.
